downloadDescription: Microsoft is updating our on-premises outsourcing software terms.

downloadFile.name: FAQ for customers Microsoft outsourcing rights updates.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/3/0/8/3082c2fa-16b5-4025-b003-db9efedf91d2/FAQ for customers Microsoft outsourcing rights updates.pdf

detailsSection: Microsoft is updating our on-premises outsourcing software terms to clarify the distinction between traditional on-premises and public cloud licensing, and to create more consistent licensing terms across public cloud deployment options including multitenant and dedicated hosted cloud services.
detailsSection_file_name: FAQ for customers Microsoft outsourcing rights updates.pdf
